pages.text: Curses are malicious magic cast with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/brazier)Brazier$().$(br2)To cast an effective curse, you will need the $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$() of your target and put it in the $(l:bewitchment:tools/brazier)Brazier$(), in addition to the other ingredients.$(br2)After putting in all of the ingredients, light the $(l:bewitchment:tools/brazier)Brazier$() with a Flint and Steel to cast the curse.

Curses will wear off after seven days, but they can also be $(l:bewitchment:rituals/cleansing)Cleansed$() using the respective ritual.$(br2)Do note that all curses need at least 400 $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)ME$() available; greater curses require 800 $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)ME$().
